meanings.definition: A group of women who are extremely unpleasant or difficult to deal with.
meanings.sent1: The superbitches in the office always gossip and exclude others.
meanings.sent2: I try to avoid the superbitches at the gym because they are always rude.
meanings.sent3: The superbitches at the party refused to dance with anyone.
meanings.sent4: The superbitches of the schoolyard ruled with icy stares and sharp tongues.
meanings.sent5: The superbitches' clique was like a fortress, impenetrable to outsiders.

meanings.definition: To behave in a rude or aggressive manner, especially towards women.
meanings.sent1: She superbitches at every opportunity, making others uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: He superbitches whenever someone disagrees with him.
meanings.sent3: The cat superbitches when you try to pet her belly.
meanings.sent4: The storm superbitches through the night, rattling windows and doors.
meanings.sent5: The toddler superbitches when it's time for bed, throwing a tantrum.

meanings.definition: Of the highest quality or standard.
meanings.sent1: The superbitches performance left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent2: She received a superbitches rating for her exceptional work.
meanings.sent3: The cake was superbitches, everyone wanted a second slice.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise painted the sky in superbitches hues of pink and gold.
meanings.sent5: The tailor's craftsmanship was superbitches, every stitch perfect.
